text: Yes the beta would be required to use HubL filters on contact properties in an email
You should take a look at the documentation around deliverability <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/email/email-deliverability-best-practices>

Here is the 2nd screenshot. Can you please urgently help to solve the issue? Thank you

If you pull the two clcik on the two flexible column modules you should be able to click on the more button in the settings and reveret them to static columns. You should then be able to make a global group.
If we had a hardcoded sender name , emails go to the inbox but , if we use custom token for sender email address, and our email keep on ending in junk mailbox

Are you asking about having a dropdown field on your action with options that are loaded from an API call? If so, check out example 3 in our <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/automation/custom-workflow-actions|custom actions API docs>. Specifically the `widgetSize` field has an `optionsUrl` which will be called by Workflows to load the dropdown options.

If the options are the same for every user and don’t need to be loaded from an API, you can look at the `widgetColor` field in example 3, which sets up 3 options for the field (red, blue, and green).
Is it just the from name but not the from address?
both from name and from address are using custom token
whose value we are passing via an api call

A bit non-developer related but, is there any functionality to schedule a report's data to be emailed as a CSV attachment? Perhaps every day or every few hours?

Hi y'all! I'm new to the HubSpot community, so please feel free let me know if this question is better suited for a different channel.

I'm trying to use the Visitor Identification API using an API Key for authorization, but I'm getting a MISSING_SCOPES error. The API tells me I'm missing the "conversations.visitor_identification.tokens.create" scope.

Is there a way to configure the scopes for a HubSpot API Key? Or do I need to use OAuth and generate an access token with the proper scopes enabled?

Hey <@U02C34S0RH8> 
Probably ,either you can use HubSpot API Key as hapi_key comes with complete API control in HubSpot, or If a API doesn't supports an HAPI_KEY concept...you should proceed with OAuth process to generate a token with required scopes

Hey <@U02C6B7RPUK>

• HubSpot file upload process
• HubSpot workflow -> To schedule mail automatically
• HubSpot document tool -> To generate and share attachments with the mails
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/documents/use-documents|https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/documents/use-documents>
